story:
11/27/19 UPDATE: ROOTS TO REVOLUTIONS DEBUTED #5 ON THE iTUNES WORLD CHARTS!!

We were so excited to find out that Roots to Revolutions debuted right out of the gate at #5 on the iTunes World Charts!! Our hearts are filled with joy as we begin to see our message take on a more global face! And none of this could have happened without all of YOU!! Thank you ALL for your love and your support! We are packaging up your perks right now to send out, so begin watching for those in your email and mailboxes! 

Love, Kristin & Randall

 

 

7/6/17 UPDATE: We have been having a BLAST in the studio recording all of our new music the last couple of months! It's getting to be time to begin mixing and mastering soon, so we need to go ahead and finish out PHASE 2 with $10,800 to complete this! JOIN THE REVOLUTION! 

 

3/16/17 UPDATE: So far, we successfully raised $7299 during PHASE 1 of our campaign and are now working on PHASE 2. YAY! THANK YOU!  Due to our success, our campaign is now "InDemand"  which means that  it's NOT too late- YOU CAN STILL JOIN the REVOLUTION right here, pre-purchase the album & partake in all the perks. So PLEASE SUPPORT US, and let's take this Love Revolution WORLDWIDE! 

 

 

A music REVOLUTION is at hand, & we are excited to be a part of it! With YOUR support, we can independently record & release ROOTS TO REVOLUTIONS, an album unlike anything we've done before! Its essence will open your heart & pull you into the depths of your soul. It will inspire you to reach down into your roots, RISE UP, & BE THE CHANGE!

 

“The highest goal of music is to connect one’s soul to their Divine Nature, not entertainment.”

~Pythagoras (569- 475 BC)

 

Hi, we are Randall and Kristin Brooks of Bhakti House Band, and we want to invite YOU to join us in something life-altering… world-changing… revolutionary…

 

Sunrise 108 Gayatri Meditation workshop, Fort Lauderdale, FL

 

Music Has the Power to Change the World

 

We believe that music and sacred sound have the power to change and heal the world. And our mission is to share positive, uplifting music that inspires us all to rise above the mundane and joyfully live life to the fullest. Our desire is to create a soundtrack for living a life filled with purpose and passion, and then set the world on fire with love. Our music, filled with love and mantra (Sanskrit for "protective tool for the mind"), sends out positive vibes to work on us at the most subtle levels--especially in calming the sympathetic nervous system, as well as sends a positive message to reprogram our thought and emotional patterns.

 

We all live in a society that tells us that love and kindness are not the norm. We are surrounded by programming from the media, news, politicians, and advertisers all telling us that we are broken in some way.They insist that the world is full of nothing but evil and hate at every turn, that we are doomed, and only they can save us. If we accept these suggestions as truth, then our reality will follow. 

 

But... we are here to challenge all of that.

 

 

Great teachers of the past tell us that "suggestion" is the most powerful force in the universe… that life itself was born through the power of suggestion. 100% of our human behavior is a direct result of suggestion, whether that suggestion comes from ourselves or from our environment.

What you feed grows, and what you feed yourself is what you become.

 

 

This is especially true regarding music since music has been proven to be one of the fastest and most powerful ways to instill new suggestions or change thought patterns.

That's where we come in...

 

 

A little background...

Growing up, I (Randall) accepted these type of negative suggestions from my environment, and it led me to a path of turmoil, substance abuse, violence, and aggression in my teens, and the music I listened to reinforced that identity. One night, I was fortunate to hear a song that told me a different story--that I was much more than what I had been living, that I had a purpose and was worthy to live a better life. It broke me down. I listened to that song over and over and over, allowing it to repeat all night while I slept. When I awoke the next morning, my trajectory had completely changed. And then my life changed. It was then that I began to realize the awesome power of music, and I wanted to be a part of that. It soon became my desire to write songs and share music that were inspiring and thought provoking—songs to invite others to stop and think a little more. 

 

Boy Meets Girl

 +  = 

Soon after, this boy from the hood met a girl from the west side (Kristin) who grew up surrounded by all types of music from classical to the Beatles, playing piano, writing music, singing in musical theatre productions and choirs as well as various  local bands, and who had even been a music major in college. Though from very different worlds, our voices and our hearts came together so effortlessly, and she shared my passion to share inspiring (and maybe a little controversial) music. So here we are now. We've been singing together for 22 years and married nearly 20. Completely devoted to one another as well as to our dharma (life purpose) and musical mission to spread love through song, we have shared our music as Bhakti House Band  (which means the House of Love and Devotion)  for about 8 years now. 

 

The Impact

Our country and even our world have seemed to be in an uproar lately, with many left feeling lost and in tremendous fear. United we stand; divided we fall, and our world needs healing more than ever. Music is a universal language that unifies and speaks directly to the heart. Kristin and I have personally experienced the healing power of music and are devoted to paying that forward and creating more music that heals and inspires all of us to live a full and empowered life.

We all deserve to experience love. And when we feel love, we are likely to share more love in service to others while bringing forth our gifts into greater purpose. But no one can do this alone. We are ALL here to support one another. That's why this project is so important... The more people we can reach and inspire with our music, the more people that could be inspired to heal their wounds. And when we free ourselves (and others) from our wounds, our hearts open, we feel connected to the world around us, and move with more compassion and wisdom. IMAGINE a world where LOVE and KINDNESS motivate us rather than fear; a world working in harmony to uplift and EMPOWER everyone. Welcome to the vision of Bhakti House Band music!

 

 

On top of all our music's healing power, proceeds from ALL our music efforts go to support impoverished children around the world with food, education, and medical care through our Peace Love OM Project.

 

This NEW ALBUM...

Holi Festival of Colors, 2016

 

This Indiegogo campaign is to create a new album, which will draw from our roots like never before. We will be integrating everything from old gospel and church hymns to rap and hip hop to tibetan bowls, beloved classical sanskrit mantras, and kirtan. We combine western and eastern instrumentation and rich  harmonies, all driven by a powerful combination of drums and percussion from different cultures all over the world. These various healing musical influences represent seeds of our musical past that have brought us to THIS present moment. As we integrate our experiences and expand our world view, the music we create continues to evolve to reach out to a broader audience. 

 

Bhakti Fest Joshua Tree, CA 2015

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have amazing perks and gifts in exchange for your support! So as to keep the stress down of whether or not we meet our financial goals on time here and be able to receive funds for the project and meet our deadlines, we have divided the project into several phases, and had set the initial phase goal at $5400 and SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED PHASE 1 in time to reach InDemand status! BUT it will actually take about 5 times that to create the ideal campaign and be able to do everything we hope to do with this album. We have recorded most of the album music thanks to the funds from phase 1 and are ready to complete PHASE 2 so we can begin some of the the mixing and mastering!

  • Phase 1: production/recording studio fees: $5400... COMPLETE! YAY!
  • Phase 2: mixing and mastering fees: $5400 for a total of $10,800 (in progress...)
  • Phase 3: artwork design, cd production, and printing 
  • Phase 4: perk product fulfillment, shipping, and campaign fees; tour expenses 
  • Phase 5: marketing and promotional campaign 
  • ABOVE & BEYOND... once we fund all 5 phases, anything above and beyond will go to boost us to the next level in taking our message around the world to a broader audience, uniting humanity, and sharing love.

 

Risks & Challenges

There's a new genre of music forging its way across the globe... a music revolution, if you will! And it's inspiring humanity, continually calling forth more love, more authenticity, and more empowerment in our LIVES! The only risk here is buying into a world of negativity and then standing alone, immobilized, watching life pass you by from the sidelines. Instead, why not buy into the power and possibility of love and then help us to spread that love, kindness, healing, and inspiration through uplifting music by giving to this project. We choose the latter, and you can count on us to see this project through to the finish. We don't give up until we're done. We have completed 4 other albums prior and have gathered supporting fans now in more than 52 countries, so we are confident that we can count on YOU to help us achieve this dream! Join the revolution! 

Holi Festival of Colors, 2016

 

Ways You Can Help

 

  1. Contribute to our campaign and receive an AWESOME PERK in return! 

  2. Share our campaign on your social media pages every few days

  3. Send personal messages (text, email, facebook, etc) to friends who are ready to stand up in love!

 

We understand that times can be tough, and though you may believe strongly in our project, you feel you can't contribute financially right now. AHO! Remember that there is a way you can help us tremendously by helping us get the word out:

  • share our campaign on your social media pages using the Indiegogo Share Tools
  • personally share with friends you feel could always use a boost in life (aka: everyone!)

 

WE CAN'T DO THIS WITHOUT YOU! THANK YOU! LOVE!

 

 

Thank you so much for your love and support! We value it more than words could ever convey! 

 

Namaste,

Randall & Kristin

Love, Kristin & Randall
 
 
7/6/17 UPDATE: We have been having a BLAST in the studio recording all of our new music the last couple of months! It's getting to be time to begin mixing and mastering soon, so we need to go ahead and finish out PHASE 2 with $10,800 to complete this! JOIN THE REVOLUTION! 
 
3/16/17 UPDATE: So far, we successfully raised $7299 during PHASE 1 of our campaign and are now working on PHASE 2. YAY! THANK YOU!  Due to our success, our campaign is now "InDemand"  which means that  it's NOT too late- YOU CAN STILL JOIN the REVOLUTION right here, pre-purchase the album & partake in all the perks. So PLEASE SUPPORT US, and let's take this Love Revolution WORLDWIDE! 
 

 
A music REVOLUTION is at hand, & we are excited to be a part of it! With YOUR support, we can independently record & release ROOTS TO REVOLUTIONS, an album unlike anything we've done before! Its essence will open your heart & pull you into the depths of your soul. It will inspire you to reach down into your roots, RISE UP, & BE THE CHANGE!
 
“The highest goal of music is to connect one’s soul to their Divine Nature, not entertainment.”
~Pythagoras (569- 475 BC)
 
Hi, we are Randall and Kristin Brooks of Bhakti House Band, and we want to invite YOU to join us in something life-altering… world-changing… revolutionary…
 

Sunrise 108 Gayatri Meditation workshop, Fort Lauderdale, FL
 
Music Has the Power to Change the World
 
We believe that music and sacred sound have the power to change and heal the world. And our mission is to share positive, uplifting music that inspires us all to rise above the mundane and joyfully live life to the fullest. Our desire is to create a soundtrack for living a life filled with purpose and passion, and then set the world on fire with love. Our music, filled with love and mantra (Sanskrit for "protective tool for the mind"), sends out positive vibes to work on us at the most subtle levels--especially in calming the sympathetic nervous system, as well as sends a positive message to reprogram our thought and emotional patterns.
 
We all live in a society that tells us that love and kindness are not the norm. We are surrounded by programming from the media, news, politicians, and advertisers all telling us that we are broken in some way.They insist that the world is full of nothing but evil and hate at every turn, that we are doomed, and only they can save us. If we accept these suggestions as truth, then our reality will follow. 
 
But... we are here to challenge all of that.
 

 
Great teachers of the past tell us that "suggestion" is the most powerful force in the universe… that life itself was born through the power of suggestion. 100% of our human behavior is a direct result of suggestion, whether that suggestion comes from ourselves or from our environment.
What you feed grows, and what you feed yourself is what you become.
 

 
This is especially true regarding music since music has been proven to be one of the fastest and most powerful ways to instill new suggestions or change thought patterns.
That's where we come in...
 
 
A little background...

Growing up, I (Randall) accepted these type of negative suggestions from my environment, and it led me to a path of turmoil, substance abuse, violence, and aggression in my teens, and the music I listened to reinforced that identity. One night, I was fortunate to hear a song that told me a different story--that I was much more than what I had been living, that I had a purpose and was worthy to live a better life. It broke me down. I listened to that song over and over and over, allowing it to repeat all night while I slept. When I awoke the next morning, my trajectory had completely changed. And then my life changed. It was then that I began to realize the awesome power of music, and I wanted to be a part of that. It soon became my desire to write songs and share music that were inspiring and thought provoking—songs to invite others to stop and think a little more. 
 
Boy Meets Girl

 +  = 

Soon after, this boy from the hood met a girl from the west side (Kristin) who grew up surrounded by all types of music from classical to the Beatles, playing piano, writing music, singing in musical theatre productions and choirs as well as various  local bands, and who had even been a music major in college. Though from very different worlds, our voices and our hearts came together so effortlessly, and she shared my passion to share inspiring (and maybe a little controversial) music. So here we are now. We've been singing together for 22 years and married nearly 20. Completely devoted to one another as well as to our dharma (life purpose) and musical mission to spread love through song, we have shared our music as Bhakti House Band  (which means the House of Love and Devotion)  for about 8 years now. 

 
The Impact
Our country and even our world have seemed to be in an uproar lately, with many left feeling lost and in tremendous fear. United we stand; divided we fall, and our world needs healing more than ever. Music is a universal language that unifies and speaks directly to the heart. Kristin and I have personally experienced the healing power of music and are devoted to paying that forward and creating more music that heals and inspires all of us to live a full and empowered life.
We all deserve to experience love. And when we feel love, we are likely to share more love in service to others while bringing forth our gifts into greater purpose. But no one can do this alone. We are ALL here to support one another. That's why this project is so important... The more people we can reach and inspire with our music, the more people that could be inspired to heal their wounds. And when we free ourselves (and others) from our wounds, our hearts open, we feel connected to the world around us, and move with more compassion and wisdom. IMAGINE a world where LOVE and KINDNESS motivate us rather than fear; a world working in harmony to uplift and EMPOWER everyone. Welcome to the vision of Bhakti House Band music!
 
 
On top of all our music's healing power, proceeds from ALL our music efforts go to support impoverished children around the world with food, education, and medical care through our Peace Love OM Project.
 
This NEW ALBUM...

Holi Festival of Colors, 2016
 
This Indiegogo campaign is to create a new album, which will draw from our roots like never before. We will be integrating everything from old gospel and church hymns to rap and hip hop to tibetan bowls, beloved classical sanskrit mantras, and kirtan. We combine western and eastern instrumentation and rich  harmonies, all driven by a powerful combination of drums and percussion from different cultures all over the world. These various healing musical influences represent seeds of our musical past that have brought us to THIS present moment. As we integrate our experiences and expand our world view, the music we create continues to evolve to reach out to a broader audience. 
 

Bhakti Fest Joshua Tree, CA 2015

 
What We Need & What You Get
We have amazing perks and gifts in exchange for your support! So as to keep the stress down of whether or not we meet our financial goals on time here and be able to receive funds for the project and meet our deadlines, we have divided the project into several phases, and had set the initial phase goal at $5400 and SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED PHASE 1 in time to reach InDemand status! BUT it will actually take about 5 times that to create the ideal campaign and be able to do everything we hope to do with this album. We have recorded most of the album music thanks to the funds from phase 1 and are ready to complete PHASE 2 so we can begin some of the the mixing and mastering!

Phase 1: production/recording studio fees: $5400... COMPLETE! YAY!

Phase 2: mixing and mastering fees: $5400 for a total of $10,800 (in progress...)
Phase 3: artwork design, cd production, and printing 
Phase 4: perk product fulfillment, shipping, and campaign fees; tour expenses 
Phase 5: marketing and promotional campaign 
ABOVE & BEYOND... once we fund all 5 phases, anything above and beyond will go to boost us to the next level in taking our message around the world to a broader audience, uniting humanity, and sharing love.

 

Risks & Challenges
There's a new genre of music forging its way across the globe... a music revolution, if you will! And it's inspiring humanity, continually calling forth more love, more authenticity, and more empowerment in our LIVES! The only risk here is buying into a world of negativity and then standing alone, immobilized, watching life pass you by from the sidelines. Instead, why not buy into the power and possibility of love and then help us to spread that love, kindness, healing, and inspiration through uplifting music by giving to this project. We choose the latter, and you can count on us to see this project through to the finish. We don't give up until we're done. We have completed 4 other albums prior and have gathered supporting fans now in more than 52 countries, so we are confident that we can count on YOU to help us achieve this dream! Join the revolution! 

Holi Festival of Colors, 2016
 

Ways You Can Help
 

Contribute to our campaign and receive an AWESOME PERK in return! 
Share our campaign on your social media pages every few days
Send personal messages (text, email, facebook, etc) to friends who are ready to stand up in love!

 
We understand that times can be tough, and though you may believe strongly in our project, you feel you can't contribute financially right now. AHO! Remember that there is a way you can help us tremendously by helping us get the word out:

share our campaign on your social media pages using the Indiegogo Share Tools
personally share with friends you feel could always use a boost in life (aka: everyone!)

 
WE CAN'T DO THIS WITHOUT YOU! THANK YOU! LOVE!
 

 
Thank you so much for your love and support! We value it more than words could ever convey! 
 
Namaste,
Randall & Kristin

story:
I have been asked what I would like for my 21st birthday and not been able to procure an answer because I don't desire anything physical. Truth is, I'd love for nothing more that to be able to make and release my music this summer. The time is now, it feels right and I want to get the ball rolling, but I don't have the means to finance my vision myself. 

I thought it rude to ask for money for my birthday, so I created this crowdfunding page to allow you all to become a part of the process of bringing something beautiful into being and to give you all peace of mind that your donations will be used proactively.

'I am' is my vision for myself. I've been working on perfecting the concept over the past month, and still am; I'm almost there but the more I grow, the more I tweak it...and I've been growing a lot lately. 

The project is the result of the life lessons I've learnt through past and present experiences and ambitions, and will be a multi-sensory art project that will combine music, film, photography and fashion. 

'I am' will allow you (and the world) to get to know me and what I'm trying to do through the eyes of the person who knows me the best - myself.

Your investments will go towards recording, mixing and mastering costs; and the costs associated with recording music videos and producing merchandise. 

Thank you in advance!

story:
Little Jimmy Dickens

A giant in the world of country music, this 4'11" West Virginia native was a living legend. 

Following the passing of Little Jimmy Dickens in January 2015, at age 94 - just weeks after his last appearance on The Grand Ole Opry - the West Virginia Music Hall of Fame produced a series of sold-out tribute concerts. Recording a tribute CD that featured some of the state's best-known artists was a natural next step. 

  • The list of artists who will record songs for the project include fellow Hall of Fame members Bill Withers, Connie Smith, Charlie McCoy,  Tim O'Brien, Kathy Mattea, Russ Hicks, and Bob Thompson .

Additional musicians include Ann Magnuson, Larry Groce, Mollie O'Brien and Julie Adams, Robert Shafer, Michael Lipton, John Thornton, Todd Burge, John Lilly, and others. Together they will produce a varied and memorable tribute recording, but we need your help!

We need to raise $10K

Though these world-class musicians and singers are donating their time and talents, there are still significant costs related to making this project a reality. These costs include -

Studio time - recording :$2,000

Studio time - mixing: $1,200

Studio time - mastering: $600

Artist transportation: $1,000

Design: $1,000

Promotion: $1,000

Mechanical royalties: $1,100

Manufacturing: $1,500

Hospitality, etc.: $600

TOTAL: $10,000

In exchange for your generosity and support, we are offering some attractive perks, including autographed CDs, a chance to witness a recording session, your name included on the CD packaging, and other exciting opportunities.

Our hope is to have this CD completed and ready to ship by the fall of 2016. If we don't reach our goal, we will seek funding from other sources.


The Impact

The West Virginia Music Hall of Fame has produced three other noteworthy recordings, including "Always Lift Him Up: A Tribute to Blind Alfred Reed"; The Nichols Family: "A Cry from the Mountains"; and "Strangest Dream": Alan Freeman and Robert Shafer.

With your help, this Little Jimmy Dickens Tribute CD will reach a wide audience - not only country music fans but also Americana, bluegrass, swing and a wide range of other listeners. We anticipate widespread radio support and keen interest from the press - both traditional and online. It will demonstrate the broad and lasting appeal of Little Jimmy Dickens' music as well as the creativity of the artists who contribute to this recording. Won't you become part of our team?


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute right now? That's okay! You can still help out by forwarding this information to your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter or other social media. Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools. And don't forget to check back frequently to receive updates and hear samples of the new recordings!


For more information please visit www.wvmusichalloffame.com.

story:
BIOGRAPHIE

Matinda Kamuena n'est pas seulement une jeune demoiselle des Tam Tam du Mont-Royal, mais aussi une auteure-compositrice-interprète de soul-folk-jazz. Née à Kinshasa (République Démocratique du Congo), elle a grandi dans les rythmes de rumba congolaise et les rythmes afro-cubains, avant d’arriver à Montréal comme réfugiée politique. Après avoir bougé de ville en ville, elle développe une facilité à comprendre son entourage et l’applique à ses compositions, qui se font universelles et contagieuses.

En 2013, seulement trois ans après l’achat de sa première guitare, elle se rend à l’étape des duels, lors de la première saison québécoise de La Voix (The Voice). Entretemps, c’est au Cabaret l'Assommoir dans le vieux port de Montréal et le Fibo qu’elle fait ses débuts sur scène.

S’intéressant à la Soul et aux sons organiques, on arrive parfois à deviner ses influences, allant du Jazz au Post-Rock, Metal-Funk à la Bossa nova. Ses artistes préférés? Yamashita Tatsuro, Sade, Hiromi, Seu Jorge et Jamiroquai. Après la création de son premier single Saw You in My Head (Home), elle continue à exploiter sa créativité rythmique et nous livre des textes beaucoup plus personnels.

_____________________________________

J'ai toujours eu l'habitude de composer en anglais. Au Québec on parle français, non?

Après avoir participé à une soirée open mic de poésie francophone au printemps dernier, je me suis lancé un défi : un tout premier Album francophone! Je réalise que mes idées se développent très bien dans la langue française.

(OOOhhh que oui!)

 Qui aurait cru que cette langue me ferait de l'oeil? Je réapprends à m'exprimer. Dorénavant je ne serai plus l'enfant sans mots et sans réponses!

Taaaaah Taahhhh Taammmmm! 

 

Mon projet a besoin de vous !

 

Cette campagne me permettra d'amasser des fonds pour l'enregistrement d'un album de 8 chansons en français.

Ce projet est important pour moi car il formerait un tremplin vers mon futur musical et viendrait étancher un peu ma soif artistique, j'améliorerais ma relation avec la langue française et je pourrais me lancer à pieds joints dans l'univers québécois.

Accompagnez-moi dans cette aventure musicale et linguistique pour apporter au paysage québécois une petite pointe d'exotisme congolais.

L'argent amassé permettra de couvrir les frais d'enregistrement sonore, la mastérisation (mix) et la production de l'album physique / publicité.

À votre droite se trouvent les contreparties. Ce que l'on fournit en échange de quelque chose, la compensation.

 L'impact 

Ce projet permettra d’apporter de la diversité à la scène montréalaise de par l’influence de mes origines dans ma musique. Peut-être aussi de donner du courage à d'autres musiciens/musiciennes aspirants, afin de prouver que grâce au collectif, les rêves de chacun peuvent se réaliser.

Participer à l’émission La Voix m'a permis non seulement de gagner confiance en moi et en le fait que mon style musical plaît et bouge les gens, mais aussi de ce fait de gagner la confiance du public qui a réagi positivement à ma présence. Je suis donc convaincue que grâce à vous, ce projet pourra dépasser ces échelons déjà gravis.

Risques et défis

 Bien entendu un risque existe que mon album ne décolle pas, ce qui pourrait être dû à des lacunes de ma part en moyen de communication et marketing.

Mais ayant déjà fait cette analyse je suis persuadée que je pars mieux préparée pour vaincre ces obstacles que je connais déjà. Je vais pouvoir mettre en place des stratégies ingénieuses pour les surmonter.

Ceci étant dit, il restera toujours un projet commun qui a été alimenté par une communauté de gens qui s’entendent musicalement, ce que je trouve est au final l’aboutissement d’un tel projet: de rallier les gens sur les mêmes ondes et fréquences.

D'autres façons d'aider

Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

il est possible de m'aider en promouvant mon projet par le bouche-à-oreille et surtout par internet en utilisant les outils de partage Indiegogo.

il est possible de m'aider en promouvant mon projet par le bouche-à-oreille et surtout par internet en utilisant les outils de partage Indiegogo.

story:
Ivan

My music express what's within me, it express how I'm feeling, what I'm thinking and what I believe in. I started playing the drums when I was 11 years old and never stopped since then. As I grew older, I started listening to different type of music and eventually creating my own. Right now, I conceive music as my salvation and my reason to exist so basically; I found my scape through music.


My urge to explore new musical genres and influences is the product of learning to play many different instruments. Even though the drums are my area of expertise, I'm currently improving my guitar, bass and vocal skills. 

I grew up on the classic folk and popular music of the 1990's, but started listening to Metallica and other famous metal bands as an little kid in 1996.

As Mtv came to my bedroom TV, bands like System Of A Down, Linkin Park, Limp Bizkit, Korn and Eminem were my childhood soundtrack, as in my teenager years, I was deeply influenced by Dream Theater, Liquid Tension Experiment, Stratovarius and Sepultura.

Those bands woke up my curiosity and early love for music.

Nowadays, I'm not so attached to heavy metal music, given that I absorb daily great bands as Muse, Bumblefoot, Haken, Animals As Leaders, Ayreon Bent Knee, Gentle Giant, Eruca Sativa and Ghost.

The album project reflects how I perceive reality. This project can also be defined as my inner journey throught several emotional processes, but it also has some political references.

"The Locust Speculation" reflects all of those things and many, many more.

This is my long term dream and I've always wanted to do something like this. I always wanted to take my music to the next level and to take out there, where everyone can enjoy it and relate to it. Even tho I've been in other musical projects during my life, I never had the chance to fully express myself the way I wanted to, we can say that I never could express my own musical vision.

I'm going to be playing the drums, the guitar, the bass and doing some vocals but I will also be getting help from other musicians from my country and all around the world.

The Investment

Being able to produce a CD is a really big deal. The studio costs are going through the roof! Plus all the exiting, mixing and mastering costs are really unafordable for me, without even getting started with the album art and the printing of the cd, it is way out of my reach.

So, all the money collected through this campaign will cover the recording and the release of my album. Right now, I need $2.500 to make this posible.

Here's a detailed list of the album expenses:

Recording sessions- $ 1300

Artwork- $250

Publishing and Digital Distribution- $70

Cymbals- $300

CD - $580

Estimated total - $2500

If for some reason I don't meet my campaign goal, I will put all these funds towards the recording process and do what I can to fund the rest myself, but for an 8-hour working class uruguayan this will not be easy, that's why i am calling for your contribution.

Rewards

I'm going to be printing some limited T-shirts with the artwork and posters as part of the rewards, bringing you personally some rewards as many other prizes will be a part of the package.

With your help, I hope to get started recording the drums in November and hope for a mid December release date.


Spread the word!

PLEASE do what you can to spread the word about this campaign!

As more people know about this, the goal will be closer!

Thanks so much for your love :)
story_txt:
Ivan
My music express what's within me, it express how I'm feeling, what I'm thinking and what I believe in. I started playing the drums when I was 11 years old and never stopped since then. As I grew older, I started listening to different type of music and eventually creating my own. Right now, I conceive music as my salvation and my reason to exist so basically; I found my scape through music.




My urge to explore new musical genres and influences is the product of learning to play many different instruments. Even though the drums are my area of expertise, I'm currently improving my guitar, bass and vocal skills. 
I grew up on the classic folk and popular music of the 1990's, but started listening to Metallica and other famous metal bands as an little kid in 1996. 
As Mtv came to my bedroom TV, bands like System Of A Down, Linkin Park, Limp Bizkit, Korn and Eminem were my childhood soundtrack, as in my teenager years, I was deeply influenced by Dream Theater, Liquid Tension Experiment, Stratovarius and Sepultura. 
Those bands woke up my curiosity and early love for music. 
Nowadays, I'm not so attached to heavy metal music, given that I absorb daily great bands as Muse, Bumblefoot, Haken, Animals As Leaders, Ayreon Bent Knee, Gentle Giant, Eruca Sativa and Ghost.
The album project reflects how I perceive reality. This project can also be defined as my inner journey throught several emotional processes, but it also has some political references. 
"The Locust Speculation" reflects all of those things and many, many more.
This is my long term dream and I've always wanted to do something like this. I always wanted to take my music to the next level and to take out there, where everyone can enjoy it and relate to it. Even tho I've been in other musical projects during my life, I never had the chance to fully express myself the way I wanted to, we can say that I never could express my own musical vision.
I'm going to be playing the drums, the guitar, the bass and doing some vocals but I will also be getting help from other musicians from my country and all around the world.
The Investment
Being able to produce a CD is a really big deal. The studio costs are going through the roof! Plus all the exiting, mixing and mastering costs are really unafordable for me, without even getting started with the album art and the printing of the cd, it is way out of my reach.
So, all the money collected through this campaign will cover the recording and the release of my album. Right now, I need $2.500 to make this posible. 
Here's a detailed list of the album expenses:
Recording sessions- $ 1300Artwork- $250Publishing and Digital Distribution- $70Cymbals- $300CD - $580
Estimated total - $2500
If for some reason I don't meet my campaign goal, I will put all 
these funds towards the recording process and do what I can to fund the 
rest myself, but for an 8-hour working class uruguayan this will not be easy, that's why i am calling for your contribution.
Rewards
I'm going to be printing some limited T-shirts with the artwork and posters as part of the rewards, bringing you personally some rewards as many other prizes will be a 
part of the package.
With your help, I hope to get started recording the drums in November and hope 
for a mid December release date.



Spread the word!
PLEASE do what you can to spread the word about this
 campaign!
As more people know about this, the goal will be closer!
Thanks so much for your love :)

story:
Wo I am and what I am trying to do?

  • My name is Luka Veselinovic. I am creative human being, composer,electric  bass and upright bass player. I studied history of art on college in Croatia, Rijeka  and Music on Berklee College Of Music in Boston.
  • I created this campaign  specifically for recording my second CD: Romantic Egg Is Going Home which I am planning to record in Croatia, city of Opatija.
  • Artwork, mixing and mastering I am doing by myself.

What is the funding for?

  • Expenses which I am trying to cover with this funding are very basic. Travel expenses for my brothers musicians who are coming from different countries, basic studio session recording expenses, featuring artist, daily expenses for the whole recording crew ( 5 musicians, two sound engineers) by that I mean food and apartment during 4 days of recording, costs of making physical CD-s.
  • My Perk will include digital download of my first CD, and also of the second one when it is finished  and in personal conversation I reveal  to you how does my process of creativity goes, from basic ideas to realization. From music  to artwork, to song names, to inspiration for all that.
  • If funding does not reach its destination, I will use whatever is  collected for the same thing.

Why I am recording new CD?

  • Authentic expression, truth, positive energy, living by inspiration are important for this whole world. This music is result of my inspiration and I am trying to share it an communicate with people in that way. This music is sincere part of me, with no politics included.
  • I will try to record some more exiting improvisational, original music, just like what I did on my first CD, Magnetic Whale, which led to an international Collaboration with Arrested  Development, two time Grammy Award winners on their new single: I Dont See You At The Club  and placement in finals in jazz category in ISC international music competition.
  • Title "Romantic Egg Is Going Home" is symbolic story and an artistic way to say : I want to do  things that I love so much so I forget about things I don't love.  This "Romantic Egg" does not want to participate in any kind of war or destruction.

Risks & Challenges: Art is Lifestyle

  • For me, art and music are lifestyle . These are the best ways to communicate with other people. Sharing positive attitude thru music is my main goal in this crazy world. 
  • As far I have the energy, I will continue to to keep enthusiasm and inspiration alive.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I know  life today can be hard, so if you like this project, and you would like to help me, and you don't have the possibility  to fund it, please share it with other people. just by doing that you will help me a lot.  For that purpose, Indiegogo created some easy to use share tools.

story:
Introduction:

My name is Devery Peterson. I am a college graduate, as well as a singer/songwriter with an aspiration for music & entertainment. But not just any music...inspirational music that transcends powerful messages of prosperity into rhythms and melody's that everybody can vibe too. When I make music there is a purpose. A purpose to capture the listener within a moment in their lives where things don't seem to make sense. Moments when life deals you a bad hand and you feel like you could just give up. Those are the moments that are most important to me because its in those times of despair, when we need something or somebody the most... to help remind us and reconfirm in our minds, that everything is okay.

I was born in raised in Minneapolis, Minnesota, home of some of the greatest musicians that have ever lived. I grew up listening to all sorts of music and became fond of how beautiful the sounds of human voices along a melodic tune were and how they could transport you into a completely different realm. I've spent countless hours perfecting something that i am beyond passionate about! that of which is storytelling. However, my story along with countless of others is not made up. I come from a part of the city and the country where its easy to get caught up in the wrong thing. Violence, crimes and hardships have always been a steady part of my life until recently. I've been through what most people would consider hell and still managed to constructively fight though adversity in hopes to find an avenue away from the trap that laid before me. My story is what I share through my music in detail and it is something that i think everybody can benefit from.

Project Goals:

Currently i am in the process of releasing my EP which features my single "Sacrifices" set to release may 13th of this year; and for those who are interested in supporting that as well, you'll be able to purchase that on iTunes, Google Play, Spotify and etc. My primary goals however, are to possibly gather enough funding so that i can put a music video together for it and go forth on completing a full LP album. so not a lot of money i'm asking for but just enough to get my material out there for the world and for the fans of good inspirational music. Whatever it is that you could offer would be a blessing and i assure you that you would get my complete and undivided gratitude. 

 thank you all!!

-Devery

story: This campaign was initiated to generate financial support for the Edinburgh residency and UK tour of 1000 Yard & Michelle Shocked. We raised funds by offering discounted CD packages, and tickets to performances. In mid-July, the circumstances behind the project changed drastically, and we ended our campaign. All previous backers received their perks as promised, & the funds raised through those contributions will cover the costs of the tour and residency that were incurred until mid-July.
story_txt: This campaign was initiated to generate financial support for the Edinburgh residency and UK tour of 1000 Yard & Michelle Shocked. We raised funds by offering discounted CD packages, and tickets to performances. In mid-July, the circumstances behind the project changed drastically, and we ended our campaign. All previous backers received their perks as promised, & the funds raised through those contributions will cover the costs of the tour and residency that were incurred until mid-July.

story:
Short Summary

I have recently finished up writing and recording 10 songs that will make up what is to be my 6th studio album. The track recordings are complete, including all 10 songs featuring world renowned drummer Marco Minnemann (Joe Satriani, The Aristocrats, Steven Wilson etc.). I  am now ready to get the tracks mixed, mastered and then have CD's manufactured before what is likely to be a summer 2016 release.

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking for funding to help with the final steps:

  • Mastering
  • CD Replication
  • Other Misc. expenses (fees for online sales setup etc.)
For your kind contribution I am offering a number of different perks. Among them advance copy of the recording in either digital download or CD, downloads of my previous albums, guitar tablature packages and even Executive Producer credits on the album.

Other Ways You Can Help

All contributions are greatly appreciated, but I realize not everybody is in a position to help out financially. If not it would be greatly appreciated if you could share this campaign with your friends on social media. IndieGoGo makes it easy to do so using their handy share tools.

story:
Hi, I'm DAVID. I'm SUPER excited about my new album, BEACON. For years I've written songs for other people to sing. I've had my songs in movies and TV. Now, with your help, I'm set to record and release my first album where I sing ALL of my best songs, my "Greatest Hits"!

My songs are POSITIVE and UPBEAT. They are CATCHY and INFECTIOUS, with POWERFUL lyrics and BEAUTIFUL melodies! BEACON includes 12 of my best songs, with FABULOUS full-band arrangements and SOARING vocal harmonies!

You may find yourself singing along on the first listen! Listen here:

https://soundcloud.com/user-83654703/wherever-i-am

https://soundcloud.com/user-83654703/it-takes-so-little


BEACON is an amazing album! A BEACON shines brightly, lighting the way. My songs are a BEACON that will light a path to your heart!

My dream is that my songs reach everyone who would be touched by them, to have their day made a little brighter.

Will you help make my dream a reality?

I invite you to join TEAM DAVID!

Funding Goal

My goal is to raise $26,000. This will entirely fund BEACON, from recording through release, as well as an initial budget for a website, music video and promotion.

I’ve already recorded and rough mixed all 12 tracks! This has cost me over $12,000, which is credit card debt that needs to be paid. Then there is final mixing, mastering, graphic design, CD production, website design, music video, promotion, etc.

 The funds will be used as follows:

recording studio/producer/musicians so far  $12,000

final mixing $1,000

mastering $1,000

album graphics $1,000

manufacture CDs  $2,000

website $1,000

Indiegogo promotions (T-Shirts, etc.)    $1,000

music video   $3,000

promotion/travel to LA  $2,000

Indiegogo/credit card fees $2,000

Total $26,000

Music is a powerful force. My songs are positive and empowering. They are my way of making a difference in this world – to lift others up – to help spread love and kindness.

I’ll finish recording BEACON and get my music out into the world, however much support I get through this Indiegogo campaign. With your help, it will happen sooner!

I invite you to check out the many PERKS I’m offering to those who join TEAM DAVID! With your support, we can fulfill the dream!

If you can help financially, THANK YOU! If not, THANK YOU - you can still join TEAM DAVID – by spreading the word, sharing my campaign with your friends, by using the Indiegogo share tools! With your help, WE’RE DOING IT!

story:
What in the world is this and why should I care?!

To give you the quick and dirty, my name is Eva Eris and I'm a pop artist writing and producing my first five song EP that I'll be releasing August 21st. 

Songwriting has always been an outlet for me since I started writing in elementary school. I'm finally at a place as an artist and as a person that I want to open up about the trauma I've been through and to use my music as a way to help others through the darker moments in life. 

I've already released two singles off of this EP:  "Other Side" and "Back To You."

        

In releasing these songs, I've shared the stories behind them and my struggles through PTSD and my eating disorder. I was sexually abused throughout my childhood and raped at age 15, and as a result, have had a lifelong battle with various mental illnesses including the previously mentioned PTSD and EDNOS, as well as depression and anxiety. 

I don't want this to be a sob story. I only share these personal details of my life because I feel that great art should be vulnerable and because I interact with people on a daily basis who face these exact same struggles. I want to bare my soul before you so that we can learn to be unashamed of the things we've been through, using our pasts to empower and strengthen us.  We can only find healing when we have the courage to face ourselves. 

This is what this EP is all about. Music is a powerful thing and I want to reach as many people as possible with this message of acceptance and empowerment.

Okay. Let's change the world, but...

where's all this money going? What's in it for me?

I'm glad you asked! The funds raised in this campaign can be broken down into four categories: 
  1. Production/Replication Expenses. This includes costs for mixing and mastering the EP, replicating physical CDs, and digital distribution costs to iTunes, Spotify, and various other online markets. (And in case you're wondering, both my singles "Other Side" and "Back to You" are already on iTunes and Spotify, so check it out!)
  2. Merchandise Expenses. This one is pretty self explanatory! Check out some of the cool merch we're going to be getting: 

       

    Women's T-Shirt Design

    Men's T-Shirt Design

    Stickers and Temporary Tattoos too!!
  3. Promotional Expenses. This is the big one here. Nowadays, anybody can record something and put it out on the web, but without proper promotion, it may as well have fallen on deaf ears. This will cover small expenses like business cards and banners, but the bulk of this category is going to be spent on music industry conferences over the next several months to promote the EP to as many people as possible! 

  4. IndieGoGo Fees. IndieGoGo charges 5% of all funds raised as well as 3% + $0.30 for third party credit card fees. There will also be shipping expenses for the rewards so these fees can add up quickly! 

"But Eva, I'm broke!" I know dat feel, bro. 

Here's some other ways you can help.

SHARE! I can't overestimate how important it is right now to help spread the word about this campaign and about this new music. So, head over to your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Vine, YouNow, Musical.ly, Pinterest, Tumblr, Myspace (making a comeback? no?) or whatever social media of your preference and SHARE this campaign, share my singles on iTunes or Spotify, help spread the word in whatever way you can! 


Alright, I think that should about cover it!! Feel free to contact me on social media if you have any questions about the campaign or the direction my music is headed. I hope you're as excited about this journey as I am!
 ❦Eva Eris❦
www.EvaEris.com
www.youtube.com/evaerisofficial
www.facebook.com/evaerisofficial
www.twitter.com/evaerisofficial
www.instagram.com/evaerisofficial
www.younow.com/evaerisofficial

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Emma Caroline Baker, a 19 year old singer/songwriter from Ogden, UT. I have the opportunity to work with an amazing producer from Portland, Oregon, but first I need to come up with the appropriate funds. Hence, I've chosen IndieGoGo to reach people like you who love the arts and might like to support me in my pursuit of this dream.

By contributing to my campaign, you:

  • Support the local arts community.
  • Fund the cost of travel, recording, and mastering of my original music.
  • HELP A BROTHA OUT.

Timeframe

Here is the master plan:

  • End of August: make the trek up to Portland and begin recording process.
  • Beginning of September: Recording completed and tracks mixed & mastered.
  • Mid-September thru November (release date): promote EP release.
  • November 21st: Birthday party. Also EP release date.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out by telling your family, friends, coworkers, whomever!
  • Share my campaign on social media - the more people that see it the better!

Share my campaign on social media - the more people that see it the better!

story:
Messages from some of our friends!
from Michael Hill!

from Lee Finkelstein!

Message from Soul Man Bobby Harden!

THIS CAMPAIGN IS THE BEGINNING OF SOMETHING BIG! We not only want to release our first analog recording, OUR AIM IS SUCCESS WITH THIS FUNDING/RELEASE, PROCEEDED BY A NEW LABEL AND BRING EXPOSURE TO OTHER GREAT MUSICAL ENDEAVORS!

Webster's Definition; SPANK-intransitive verb, to move quickly, dashingly, or spiritedly as in "The little mama was spanking across the stage backed up by a crew of awesome musicians and supported by wonderful fans!" And that's how we are now moving on this project!

For almost 20 years I have successfully produced/presented thousands of shows all over the eastern seaboard as well as Europe always with top musicians. Now I am very excited to present this next musical phase that kicks it up a notch with Mama SpanX, and this handpicked crew of phenomenal and committed musicians.

 The "Spankers", as they affectionately call themselves, Steve Johnson, Julie Sax, Steve Sadd, David Abercrombie, Ben Beckley (see Bios at ww.mamaspanx.com ) and I are ready to rock and funk it out with plenty of great original material in preparation for this recording. We have an awesome groove and sound together and with YOUR SUPPORT we will record it this September in Los Angeles and release it by December 2016.  Our goal is $21,000 and we will  record 10 to 12 tracks ANALOG! (Old school, tape! If we raise our stretch goal of $40,000, we will also be releasing it all on VINYL and Tour!).

"
Message from Mama SpanX Guitarist Steve Johnson and Woodwinds Julie Sax
 

All of us have had our successes but now we are banding together as Mama SpanX to take us all the way to the next level.  For each of us, music is magic, a way of life and a great "job" to have.  Our "job" is creating and delivering quality music and performances to audiences, inspiring people to smile, laugh, dance and generally raise the morale of society in a world filled with fear and global tensions. We very PASSIONATELY want to "SPANK" you out of the day to day muck and mire and get the whole planet in the right GROOVE!  We can only do it with YOUR SUPPORT, and YOU become a BIG part of the future success of Mama SpanX!

Truth is, we can't do it without YOU! It only takes a couple of minutes of your time to check out the perks and pick what you want. You can use credit card on this site, it's totally secure! Or PayPal  (only way to contribute from all other countries but U.S. & U.K.)  we have that set up for you as well!

Message from Mama SpanX Bassist David Abercrombie

Over the next 2 months we will be updating, commenting, answering, adding more video clips and ACKNOWLEDGING OUR CONTRIBUTORS! NOTE: If we make our minimum flexible goal of $21,000 we will only give up 5% to INDIEGOGO . If we don't reach it, then we still get what we raise but they take 10%. 

MESSAGE FROM Mama SpanX Music Director/Drummer Ben Beckley

The $21,000 Breakdown:

$10,000 for the recording/release. We are going for that RETRO sound and have hooked it all up with studio &  award winning (Fleetwood Mac)  engineer Richard Robinson (with a vintage Neve's soundboard for you Audiophiles!) to work with us on creating the highest quality ANALOG recording! This includes everything; Studio, engineer/producer, mixing, mastering, CD's, Artwork, licensing (we will do one cover) and digital uploads, websites, etc.

The other $11,000, breaks down:

$5000 for radio promotions (Yes, airplay costs money and is necessary for the band's success.)

$6000 for rehearsal space, rentals, travel, photography, promotional materials, internet visibility and getting the perks to YOU!

MESSAGE FROM RICHARD ROBINSON:

"I am working with the very talented Nikki Armstrong and her band Mama SpanX on her new recording project. We'll be recording at Kingsize Soundlabs with a vintage Neve 8068 mixer on analog tape! I've made many records there, the Aggrolites, Stolen Dagger, Mackshow... One of my favorite rooms in LA, loaded with great gear. 
There is a need for funds to bring the project to the exact expected result. Many prizes are to be won for various contributions, in fact this crowdfunding page is like a party, with awesome endorsements and the Mama SpanX story!"

 $21,000 is the minimum, we need!

Our stretch goal is $40,000 and with that we can really kick some butt. We can produce Vinyl, get a publicist, more radio promotions, create cool merchandise (such as Mama SpanX percussion paddles!), tour, launch our own record label that produces, presents other artists. and SPANK it into high gear! 

YOU CAN SHARE THIS TOO! Whether or not you are able to contribute, please consider sharing it with your friends by using the share tools here. We just might find a donor out there who can pull us through!  But if all our FB friends, family, and fans each contribute, we can make it! It’s quite amazing, right?  So look at the levels and perks, dig as deep as you can and we promise we will be GRATEFUL, DELIVER and GIVE IT TO YOU!

Message from N.Y. Boss Guitar Man DAVE FIELDS!

The Risks: How is this campaign managed, you ask?  Larry Cerrone, who is our finance manager and team member here, has successfully been running live music venues all over NYC for many years.  He never lets a dime go anywhere without being accounted for! Without his assistance in this area over the past several years I would not have been able to travel all over or even launch this project!

What will you get is we don't raise our goal...... after spending 3/4 of the last year away from home, and now back here in LA until September working constantly on this project, after we've spent hundreds of hours of planning, coordination, creating the music, the web tools, phone calls, emails, research (OMG, I've spent the last 2 months preparing for this band and recording and now several months putting together this campaign!)......?  I am TOTALLY DEDICATED and those who know me know that I ALWAYS pull it through, and I keep my promises! So here's what we will do.... If we don't get enough $ on this campaign, we will keep trying! Go to another group fund site and keep putting the music together until we get there! Those who contribute here will still get their perks when we get there, we promise! Because SPANKERS never give up!

WE "SPANK "YOU VERY MUCH FOR ANY AND ALL CONTRIBUTIONS! PLEASE SHARE AND STAY TUNED FOR ALL THE UPDATES WE WILL BE POSTING FROM HERE ON! ALWAYS FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR “2 CENTS”!

Sincerely,  Nikki Armstrong & The Spankers aka Mama SpanX

"I have been an owner-operator of Suede Recording Studio and Video Production Company for 45 years.  I have worked with some legends and up and coming legends.  Nikki Armstrong is one of those Up-coming legends that has been entertaining audiences for years! Nikki is an extraordinary dynamic exciting entertainer as well as a prolific songwriter, talent co-coordinator and, producer. She always surround’s herself with the BEST talent available. Nikki is a delight to work with in the studio and on stage live. She is always cheerful, optimistic and always completes the projects she starts. Her honesty, integrity and passion to her music, her audience and her fans is to be rewarded and acknowledged." Bob Suede, Producer-Musician

“Nikki’s performance is superb!  The band is excellent!"     Melvin Sparks, Legendary ‘SoulJazz’ Guitarist, Producer

“In the years I've known and been involved with Nikki Armstrong, basically from her start. I've watched her evolve into a spanking butt kicking artist with her drive, professional manner as an artist and entertainer and most importantly a downright great woman, who has persevered in this business of music… Nikki gets thumbs up from me!” Howie Lindeman-Record Producer, Engineer, FOH engineer w. Stevie Wonder, Roberta Flack, and Natalie Cole

“What a performer. You've got it all: class, power, dynamics, showmanship, and the most amazing voice” ​Terry Silverlight (Award winning Songwriter & Drummer)

“I can't thank you enough for your wonderful performance. Our phones were on fire during your live music set. YOU were in total control of your band of great musicians, who backed you up to the hilt under your very professional leadership. Listening to you really knocks me out!​“  Bill Nolan (Host of WPKN FM’S Antique Blues, the longest running rhythm and blues program in the U.S.)

Sweet, Sweet Nikki, the pitfalls of the "music business" is something we are all subjected to, at one time or another! In your case, you have so much talent and smarts going for you (besides your beauty) you must not let it deter you...Expect it, and I'm certain you will surely climb that next plateau!! ​Vinnie Bell, Legendary session guitarist/inventor

 

(Disclaimer: There is NO relation to undergarments, No harmful or degrading acts/intentions in any reference of SPANK, SpanX, or "paddles" in this campaign, "Mama SpanX" Band or "Spankers". )

story:
My name is David Segall

and I create music with a mission to cultivate peace, share love, and bring forth the heart and soul within each of us. I've been writing, recording and performing for over 12 years. I've toured across the U.S., released three albums and filmed six music videos along the way. With great joy and gratitude, I'm embarking on my first-ever tour of Europe, sharing my music with an international audience and fulfilling a life-long dream. What inspires me most about this journey is having the opportunity to share love through music and to witness people of many cultures light up, as they remember that they too are love and they too have the power to be the change they wish to see in the world! I want to document and share this whole experience, so I've asked my videographer and percussionist friend Ben Cummings to join me on the tour. Together, we want to create a powerful video series to document the journey and share encouraging stories from the soul: stories of walking through fear, embracing Love, and following the direction of our dreams.

What We Need

In order to bring this video series and tour to life, Ben and I are aiming to raise $4,800 to cover our costs of:

  • Traveling to and through Europe
  •  Our lodging and simple, healthy meals to keep us strong and moving forward on the journey
  • Reaching a greater audience online by effectively marketing the video series through social media and SEO

I invite you to participate in the journey with us by contributing to our fundraising effort and watching the video series as it unfolds several times each week during the duration of the tour!

What You Get 

In addition to the life-enriching content we'll be sharing with you along the five-week tour, I'm also offering some amazing and exclusive perks to contributors, which include:

  • Brand new Love Be My Voice mandala t-shirts and tanks, exclusively designed for this campaign by artist Jenni Hues
  • Autographed Soul of the World Tour posters with unique artwork and hand-written lyrics
  • Autographed copies of my latest album, Godspeed, to keep or give as gifts!
  • A two-hour private cruise aboard a sailboat with me as your captain, for you and up to three friends
  • A private concert for you and your friends aboard a 50' yacht in the Santa Barbara Harbor!
  • Personalized Yoga lessons, voice lessons, piano lessons and guitar lessons from yours truly (all experience levels)

I realize not everyone may be able to make a monetary contribution. Please know that your willingness to assist by simply sharing this campaign and music with your friends and family is priceless, and is one of the most powerful ways you can contribute to its success! Your word-of-mouth and ability to share from the heart helps us tremendously, and it's truly through YOU that the fulfillment of this vision is possible. Thank you, thank you, and thank you again for your willingness to contribute and partake in this journey in every way possible!

The Impact

Positive change and evolution starts on the micro-level, the personal level, and ripples outward from here, like a powerful wave.  Intentional, heart-centered music is a powerful movement in and of itself and awakens the creative Artist in us all! I am honored to share this music, the inspiring stories to come and the wisdom from the journey with each and every one of you!

story:
Parcours musical / Background

Ça fait depuis l'âge de 10 ans que je compose la musique en français. Depuis ce temps, j'ai gagné beaucoup d'expérience professionnelle. Voici quelques-unes de mes réussites parmi plusieurs:

  • Finaliste à La Brunante (concours et formation provinciale pour les auteurs-compositeurs-interprètes) en 2014 et 2016;
  • Participation au Canadian Songwriter Challenge (projet de collaboration musicale pour les auteurs-compositeurs venant du Nord de l'Ontario) en 2016;
  • Participation à l'enregistrement du projet iStudio21 (collaboration musicale pour les élèves franco-ontariens) en 2016;
  • Plusieurs formations pour améliorer ma plume et mes compétences musicales.
Après beaucoup de travail et de réflection, j'ai décidé de finalement commencer une nouvelle aventure: l'enregistrement. Je suis très fière de ce que j'ai déjà accomplie dans l'industrie musicale et l'enregistrement est la prochaine étape. Je dois remercier les gens comme vous qui m'appuient et m'encouragent à continuer. Sans vous, ma carrière ne serait pas possible!
_______________________________________________________________________
I have been songwriting since the age of ten. Since then, I have gained a lot of professional experience. Here are a few examples of what I've been able to accomplish:
  • Finalist of La Brunante (provincial competition and workshop for singer-songwriters) in 2014 and 2016;
  • Participated in the Canadian Songwriter Challenge (collaborative project for songwriters from Northern Ontario) in 2016;
  • Participated in the recording of the iStudio21 project (collaborative project for Franco-Ontarian students) in 2016;
  • Followed several workshops to improve my writing and musical skills.
After a lot of work and reflexion, I have decided to finally start off on a new adventure: recording. I am very proud of what I've already been able to accomplish in the musical industry and recording is the next step. I have to acknowledge and thank people like you who support me and encourage me to keep going. Without you, my career wouldn't be possible!

Le but ultime / The Ultimate Goal

Pour mon projet, j'aurais besoin de 1000$. La plupart de cet argent va être utilisé pour financer l'enregistrement de mon EP. Le reste va m'aider à payer pour la production des albums physiques et pour la distribution de mon EP numérique et physique. Si je ne suis pas capable d'atteindre mon but, je vais quand même faire mon enregistrement avec les fonds que j'ai déjà, mais ça va peut-être prendre plus longtemps pour lancer mon album. Il se peut aussi que je ne pourrai pas créer le même montant de copies physiques que je voulais et je vais seulement être capable de créer ceux que vous avez commandés.
Votre appui envers mon projet amènera à des récompenses! Vous pouvez vous procurer une copie de mon EP, soit physique ou numérique, ou même faire partie des gens que je remercie sur ma page Facebook ou sur la pochette! Chaque dollar que vous donnez compte et je veux être capable de vous offrir un beau produit en retour.
_______________________________________________________________________
For my project, I will need $1000. Most of this money will go toward the recording of this EP. The rest of it will help me to pay for the production of the physical albums and for the distribution of the physical and digital albums. If I am not able to reach my goal, I will still record with the existing funds, but it may take longer to release it. It is also possible that I won't be able to create the same amount of physical copies that I wanted and I will only be able to make the amount that people pre-ordered.
Your support towards this project comes with rewards! You will be able to get a copy of my EP (either physical or digital) or even be part of my acknowledgements list on either my Facebook page or on the sleeve! Each dollar that you donate means so much to me and I want to be able to offer you a wonderful product in return.

Votre appui est clé! / Your Support is Key!

Merci à tout le monde qui veut faire partie de ce beau projet! S'il vous plaît partagez ma campagne sur les médias sociaux!
Thank you to everyone that wants to be part of this wonderful project! Please share my campaign on social media!

Followed several workshops to improve my writing and musical skills.

After a lot of work and reflexion, I have decided to finally start off on a new adventure: recording. I am very proud of what I've already been able to accomplish in the musical industry and recording is the next step. I have to acknowledge and thank people like you who support me and encourage me to keep going. Without you, my career wouldn't be possible!
   Le but ultime / The Ultimate Goal
 
Pour mon projet, j'aurais besoin de 1000$. La plupart de cet argent va être utilisé pour financer l'enregistrement de mon EP. Le reste va m'aider à payer pour la production des albums physiques et pour la distribution de mon EP numérique et physique. Si je ne suis pas capable d'atteindre mon but, je vais quand même faire mon enregistrement avec les fonds que j'ai déjà, mais ça va peut-être prendre plus longtemps pour lancer mon album. Il se peut aussi que je ne pourrai pas créer le même montant de copies physiques que je voulais et je vais seulement être capable de créer ceux que vous avez commandés.
Votre appui envers mon projet amènera à des récompenses! Vous pouvez vous procurer une copie de mon EP, soit physique ou numérique, ou même faire partie des gens que je remercie sur ma page Facebook ou sur la pochette! Chaque dollar que vous donnez compte et je veux être capable de vous offrir un beau produit en retour.
_______________________________________________________________________
For my project, I will need $1000. Most of this money will go toward the recording of this EP. The rest of it will help me to pay for the production of the physical albums and for the distribution of the physical and digital albums. If I am not able to reach my goal, I will still record with the existing funds, but it may take longer to release it. It is also possible that I won't be able to create the same amount of physical copies that I wanted and I will only be able to make the amount that people pre-ordered.
Your support towards this project comes with rewards! You will be able to get a copy of my EP (either physical or digital) or even be part of my acknowledgements list on either my Facebook page or on the sleeve! Each dollar that you donate means so much to me and I want to be able to offer you a wonderful product in return.

    Votre appui est clé! / Your Support is Key!
Merci à tout le monde qui veut faire partie de ce beau projet! S'il vous plaît partagez ma campagne sur les médias sociaux!
Thank you to everyone that wants to be part of this wonderful project! Please share my campaign on social media!

story:
Hey! What's up, my name is Jayne Claire. I moved out to LA early this year for work, and the city has brought back from the dead my songwriting and music vibes. I've begun writing again, and even got to record an original at a friend's home studio. That song is called "Party Dress", and you can play it above to see if you dig my style. My music tends to be pop/country/folk, and I would love to share more of it with the world.  
My ultimate goal and dream is to record an album, or even an EP, of my original music. The funding I am looking for would go towards this album, equipment, producing it, studio time, and anything else to help me get where I know I can go. If I don't reach my goal, I will still be hella grateful; I will use any money I receive to get equipment that will enhance my music and recording process.  
I've somehow found myself in LA, writing music, and people listening. I am excited and thankful. Any contribution would help me really go for this dream. I have taken the first few baby steps, but I just know there are leaps coming soon.  

There is always the risk that an album can fall through. But know that I am beyond passionate about telling my story through my music, and I will do anything I can to get it out there. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I have released my first single, "Party Dress", on YouTube, iTunes, Spotify, and Sound Cloud. Check it out and share it if you like what you hear!

story:
After being together for 5 years, Dividing Face has heard you.  You want a record!  Well we have decided to hit the studio with one of the best rock producers today to record our debut album that will certainly make it worth your wait!  You, the Face Fans, have been the best fans and have supported us so much the last 5 years.  While we are asking again for your support to help cover some of the costs of this recording, we also want to make YOU, the fans, a part of this album and help to make it YOURS. 

Your contribution will go towards the recording, mixing, mastering, and CD production of our album.

As a Thank You for your contribution, we have many perks available to help bring you closer to the Dividing Face family.  No amount is too small, whether it's $5 or $500, every little bit helps.

All contributing backers will get a sincere Thank You from the band along with special access to studio footage that will be updated throughout the campaign.

We hope to have you come along with us on this incredible journey so we can experience this together!

Garrett, George, Dan, & Sonny

Dividing Face

story:
La Saint-Jean Après Tout l'Monde

  •  Nous sommes un collectif qui a à cœur la culture riche et diversifiée du Mile End, à Montréal.
  •  Cette première édition de la Saint-Jean Après Tout l'Monde est une fête familiale qui met en valeur des artistes du quartier. Nous pensons qu'il est important que les gens connaissent mieux la vie artistique qui y grouille sans relâche. Nous nous installerons sur la rue Saint-Viateur, entre Saint-Urbain et de l'Esplanade, et tout au long de la journée nous offrirons des activités et des ateliers pour tous. La journée se terminera avec une suite de numéros musicaux.
  • Nous avons besoin de vous afin de faire rayonner tout ce talent car l'air et l'eau fraiche- bien qu'indispensables, ne suffisent pas à les soutenir. 

 

 Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

  •  Nous avons déjà amassé une partie du budget et Nous avons besoin de vous pour le boucler. Cachets d'artistes, locations diverses (son, entretien, etc.), et promotion entre-autres.
  •  En contreparties, nous offrons des T-shirt aux couleurs du collectif, un souper avec les membres, un massage à domicile, et même une chanson unique créée pour la personne donnant le montant espéré.
  •  Quoi qu'il en soit, tous les fonds seront redistribués à la communauté culturelle du Mile End.

 L'impact

  •  Notre projet est une vision rassembleuse, et notre intention est d'amener un support moral et financier à la création locale. Nous pourrons le réaliser grâce à vous.
  •  Nos membres ont des expériences diverses dans ce genre d'événement, et nous sommes capables de mener à terme le processus.
  •  Un tronçon de rue fermé pour l'occasion, des rencontres enrichissantes et de la musique plein les oreilles avec des gens tels que Claude Lamothe, Lou Laurence, ADokta et plus encore.

 Risques et défis

  •  Nous sommes prêts à relever ce défi, chacun ayant déjà participé de près ou de loin à un tel événement.
  •  Quoi qu'il arrive, la fête aura lieu.

 D'autres façons d'aider

  •  Partagez avec vos amis!
  •  Et n'oubliez pas d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !

Et le tour est joué.

(ENGLISH)

St. John According to All

  •  We are a non-profit collective dedicated to the rich and diverse culture of Montreal's Mile End, one of the most artistically saturated neighbourhoods in North America. We organize events that highlight the unique spirit of the neighbourhood and mabilize its incredible talent.
  • This first edition of Saint-Jean According to All is a family celebration that showcases a range of remarkable artists from the neighbourhood. We believe it is important that Montrealers are more familiar with the artistic life that swarms relentlessly in our city. The celebration will be held in the hub of the hood - St. Viateur Street, between Saint-Urbain and Esplanade. Throughout the day we will offer activities and workshops for all, concluding with a lineup of musical performances by Montreal legends and secret talents you don't want to miss.
  • We need you to help us make all that talent shine because air and water, while indispensable, are not enough to support them.

What We Need and What You Get

  •  We need money to balance our budget and pay the artists, their promotion and equipment rental.
  • In turn, we offer T-shirts with the colors of the collective, a dinner with the members of our collective, a home massage, and even a song created especially for you.
  • All funds will be redistributed to the cultural community of Mile End.

The Impact

  • Our project is a culturally unifying vision - our intention is to bring exposure, moral and financial support to local talent. We can achieve this with your help!
  • Our members bring together diverse abilities and competences, and together we are able to carry out successfully all aspects of this project.
  • A stretch of St. Viateur Street will be closed for the occasion and will be made available to pedestrians, offering enriching encounters with local creators as well as an exceptional musical live programme with the likes of Claude Lamothe, Lou Laurence, Dakota and more.

Risks and Challenges

  •  The main challenge is organizing the multiple aspects of the event. We are already half way through. We are ready to meet this challenge, each having already participated in one way or another in such an event.

Whatever happens, the party will be on!

Other Ways to Help

  •  Share with your friends!
  • And do not forget to use Indiegogo sharing tools!
Off we go!
